params.positionId: the id of the position the cellar wants to add

returns.adaptor: the address of the adaptor, isDebt bool indicating whether position is         debt or not, and adaptorData needed to interact with position

distrustAdaptor(address).details: Doing so prevents Cellars from adding this adaptor to their catalogue.

distrustPosition(uint32).details: Doing so prevents Cellars from adding this position to their catalogue,      and adding the position to their tracked arrays.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.newContract: address of the new contract to register

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.adaptor: address of the adaptor to trust
the adaptor address this position uses
params.adaptorData: arbitrary bytes used to configure this position

returns.positionId: the position id of the newly added position

PRICE_ROUTER_REGISTRY_SLOT().notice: Addresses of the positions currently used by the cellar.

TRANSITION_PERIOD().notice: The amount of time it takes for an ownership transition to work.

addPositionToCellar(uint32).notice: Called by Cellars to add a new position to themselves.

approvedForDepositOnBehalf(address).notice: In order for an address to make deposits on behalf of users they must be approved.

batchPause(address[]).notice: Allows multisig to pause multiple cellars in a single call.

batchUnpause(address[]).notice: Allows multisig to unpause multiple cellars in a single call.

cancelTransition().notice: Allows Zero Id address to cancel an ongoing owner transition.

completeTransition().notice: Allows pending owner to complete the ownership transition.

getAddress(uint256).notice: Get the address associated with an id.

getPositionHashToPositionId(bytes32).notice: Maps a position hash to a position Id.

getPositionIdToPositionData(uint32).notice: Maps a position id to its position data.

isAdaptorTrusted(address).notice: Maps an adaptor address to bool indicating whether it has been set up in the registry.

isCallerPaused(address).notice: Mapping stores whether or not a cellar is paused.

isIdentifierUsed(bytes32).notice: Maps an adaptors identfier to bool, to track if the identifier is unique wrt the registry.

isPositionTrusted(uint32).notice: Maps a position to a bool indicating whether or not it is trusted.

nextId().notice: The unique ID that the next registered contract will have.

pendingOwner().notice: The Pending Owner, that becomes the owner after the transition period, and they call `completeTransition`.

positionCount().notice: Stores the number of positions that have been added to the registry.         Starts at 101.

register(address).notice: Register the address of a new contract.

revertIfAdaptorIsNotTrusted(address).notice: Reverts if `adaptor` is not trusted by the registry.

revertIfPositionIsNotTrusted(uint32).notice: Reverts if `positionId` is not trusted by the registry.

setAddress(uint256,address).notice: Set the address of the contract at a given id.

setApprovedForDepositOnBehalf(address,bo.notice: toggles a depositors  ability to deposit into cellars on behalf of users.

transitionOwner(address).notice: Allows Zero Id address to set a new owner, after the transition period is up.

transitionStart().notice: The starting time stamp of the transition.

trustAdaptor(address).notice: Trust an adaptor to be used by cellars

trustPosition(address,bytes).notice: Trust a position to be used by the cellar.

documentation.text:
@notice Attempted to set the address of a contract that is not registered.
 @param id id of the contract that is not registered
@notice The unique ID that the next registered contract will have.
@notice Get the address associated with an id.
@notice In order for an address to make deposits on behalf of users they must be approved.
@notice toggles a depositors  ability to deposit into cellars on behalf of users.
@notice Set the address of the contract at a given id.

@notice Register the address of a new contract.
 @param newContract address of the new contract to register
@notice Emitted when an ownership transition is started.
@notice Emitted when an ownership transition is cancelled.
@notice Emitted when an ownership transition is completed.
@notice Attempted to call a function intended for Zero Id address.
@notice Attempted to transition owner to the zero address.
@notice Attempted to perform a restricted action while ownership transition is pending.
@notice Attempted to cancel or complete a transition when one is not active.
@notice Attempted to call `completeTransition` from an address that is not the pending owner.
@notice The amount of time it takes for an ownership transition to work.
@notice The Pending Owner, that becomes the owner after the transition period, and they call `completeTransition`.
@notice The starting time stamp of the transition.
@notice Allows Zero Id address to set a new owner, after the transition period is up.
@notice Allows Zero Id address to cancel an ongoing owner transition.
@notice Allows pending owner to complete the ownership transition.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Ownable: caller is not the owner"

arguments.value: Ownable: caller is not the owner

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Ownable: caller is not the owner"

documentation.text: @notice Extends OZ Ownable `_checkOwner` function to block owner calls, if there is an ongoing transition.
@notice Emitted when a target is paused.
@notice Emitted when a target is unpaused.
@notice Attempted to unpause a target that was not paused.
@notice Attempted to pause a target that was already paused.
@notice Mapping stores whether or not a cellar is paused.
@notice Allows multisig to pause multiple cellars in a single call.
@notice Allows multisig to unpause multiple cellars in a single call.
@notice Helper function to pause some target.
@notice Helper function to unpause some target.
@notice Attempted to trust an adaptor with non unique identifier.
@notice Attempted to use an untrusted adaptor.
@notice Attempted to trust an already trusted adaptor.
@notice Maps an adaptor address to bool indicating whether it has been set up in the registry.
@notice Maps an adaptors identfier to bool, to track if the identifier is unique wrt the registry.

@notice Trust an adaptor to be used by cellars
 @param adaptor address of the adaptor to trust

@notice Allows registry to distrust adaptors.
 @dev Doing so prevents Cellars from adding this adaptor to their catalogue.
@notice Reverts if `adaptor` is not trusted by the registry.

@notice Attempted to trust a position not being used.
 @param position address of the invalid position
@notice Attempted to add a position with bad input values.
@notice Attempted to add a position that does not exist.
@notice Attempted to add a position that is not trusted.
@notice Addresses of the positions currently used by the cellar.

@notice Stores the number of positions that have been added to the registry.
         Starts at 101.

@notice Maps a position hash to a position Id.
 @dev can be used by adaptors to verify that a certain position is open during Cellar `callOnAdaptor` calls.

@notice Maps a position id to its position data.
 @dev used by Cellars when adding new positions.
@notice Maps a position to a bool indicating whether or not it is trusted.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (bytes memory) view external returns (contract ERC20[] memory)

documentation.text: @notice Reverts if `positionId` is not trusted by the registry.
